bibl.title: Agriculture and the 'Taxes-and-Trade' Model in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Translation and adaptation of: IDEM, Landbouw en het "taxes-and-trade model" in Romeins Egypte, Lampas 31 (1998) pp. 290-305, 2 graphiques. - 1. The economy of the Roman empire after The Ancient Economy. - 2. The 'taxes-and-trade' model for the economy of the Roman Empire. - 3. The 'taxes-and-trade' model applied to Egypt in the early Roman empire. - 4. Agriculture in Roman Egypt: the big picture. - 5. Agriculture in Egypt: the nitty-gritty. - Pp. 216-220: Bibliographical appendix.
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, Agriculture and the 'Taxes-and-Trade' Model in Roman Egypt.
